asset.author: breville

transcripts: Electric locks are helpful kitchen tools . They're versatile fast and convenient. End stir-frying is convenient and an easy way to cook . The breville hot wok has a unique butterfly shape heating element. It allows to walk to heat up the sides which replicates authentic style asian cooking . And the quantanium nonstick base uses less oil and cleans up effortlessly. The breville hot wok can be used for almost any cooking type such as shallow, frying steaming slow cooking and boiling and use it to make soup, sausage, breakfast dishes  and of course to fry's. It has 14 heat settings and then you have your high sear setting. Whenever you're cooking, always allowed to hot wok to preheat for 10 minutes before you begin to cook . Even if you want to use the low setting 40 slow cook recipe, first hit the walk at a high here and then take it back to whatever setting you want. And never add the oil when the water is still cold or try to heat it up with the united as this will produce a poorcooking result . And because of the handles and sturdy base, you can actually transfer the breville hot walk to the table with a banquet style serving . All parts are best hand washed but lid can be placed in the dishwasher. And be sure not to place the glass lid under cold water while it is still hot because it can break or crack . So when storing the wok line the walk with 2 sheets of paper towel and place the probe inside so doesn't scratch . The hot wok brought to you by the food thinkers at breville
